About Me

Let me tell you about my skills and experience...

BIO

Hi!, I am graduate student studying Information systems at Northeastern University,Boston experienced in building high quality,scalable web applications.I have three years of experience and worked as a Backend developer, Data Analyst at Tata Consultancy Services. I am looking for internship/fulltime job as a Backend developer, Frontend developer, Full stack engineer starting January 2021

Tata Consultancy Services

Software Engineer

Developed a backend application using a Spring MVC for American Express credit card team under strict deadline Refactored the existing code, added new application features and boosted the efficiency of the application by 25% Designed UI for the internal insurance portal. Tackled various issues related to browser compatibility, tested and improved the loading time by 50%

AI skunkworks

Web Developer

Contributed to COVID 19 volunteer website to develop dynamic and interactive website using ReactJS and Redux Conducted testing of the applications and designed the website to be responsive. Integrated data visualisations, charts and maps.

Northeastern University

Instructional Assistant

Assisting the Information Technology department to kick start hybrid model of learning at the University.Troubleshooting the computer infrastructure and providing support to professors and students for smooth learning.
